statements: DELETE FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE total_attacks > 100 AND malware_detected = TRUE;
DELETE FROM cybersecurity_trends WHERE trend_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM cybersecurity_trends WHERE trend_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM Metrics WHERE Metric_Value > 100 AND Timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Records WHERE Record_Value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND Record_Date > '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE id = 1 AND role = 'admin';
DELETE FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious Login';
DELETE FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'Critical' AND reported_by = 'Admin';
